topic.title: Referral to Treatment Clock Stop Administrative Event
topic.shortdesc: DSCN 18/2006 published in December 2006, defined essential new data items required to support the measurement of 18 week REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIODS (monitoring of DH PSA target 13 - "By 2008, no one will have to wait longer than 18 weeks from GP referral to hospital treatment").
